code:
local function fileSizeBytes(path)
  f = io.open(path, 'rb')
  if f == nil then
    return 0
  end
  local size = string.len(f:read("*all"))
  return size
end


local function fileSizeKB(path)
  return fileSizeBytes(path) / 1024
end

local function fileSizeMB(path)
  return fileSizeKB(path) / 1024
end
